name: deimosrising
text: The first story arc begins, an era ends.

name: i_have_airwolf
text:
One of my favorite alt texts-

"He can't feel his sack just because he waited a little while?"

I like when he questions his own strips.

name: dougthehead
text: Agreed.  "The Party" really is the start of the modern Achewood, as we know and enjoy today.

name: i_love_kate
text: Nah, I'd call the Thong Retrieval a full-fledged arc. Well, maybe not entirely, but the era of unconsequential nonsensical insights and disjointed characterisation certainly ended with its beginning.

name: hipjiverobot
text: Your deep insight has earned you a chubby.

name: shinkusan
text: I also thought the French Fry was at least an arc.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Is the alt text not supposed to show up here?

name: spectre
text: Use a URL in this format to see old Achewoods with the alt text: http://achewood.com/index.php?date=03122002

name: jhunt
text: I want to know the five jokes Philippe learned.

name: perhapsmaybe
text: ray's thong should be the first one, haha

name: arcibi
text: Todd even washed his butt

name: senseihollywood
text: and Lyle probably even man-douched...

name: doublethumbfist
text: Whenever I try to turn someone on to Achewood I start them out on this one.

name: landowmpg
text: I've had very little luck getting my friends into Achewood, despite my own obsession.  Apparently my friends suck.

name: mr-siegal
text:
You only need one or two friends who like achewood.

You need at least one friend to say 'I don't know why you're laughing mucus from your nose. It's not funny; just silly.'

Spouses don't count.

name: thisdoggisproice
text: This is when I thought Roast Beef might still be a kangaroo.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: Ray looks totally pimped!

name: mastermentock
text: Damn man. He can't even feel his sack. Maybe that's from all the drinking.

name: awko
text: He can't feel his sack because he's at a party and needs to be on his best behaviour. Sack feeling is Bad Manners.

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
WHY ARE YOU WHISPERING


untouchable.

name: havenless
text: Lyle wants a huge amount to drink. As if everyone didn't know already.

name: spectre
text: "He can't feel his sack because he waited a little while?"

name: lordhumungus
text: Only the finest liquors come in bottles with handles!

name: evolume
text: plastic bottles with that grip-bump on the bottom.

name: philosophe
text: MMM Vladimir

name: randyjohnson
text: I wouldn't want people to tell me their current sack status

name: kreuzkopf
text: I think Lyle's going commando and his sack is being numbed by the cold.

name: letterswewrote
text:
I love everyone's dress duds...

cornelius has a suit with ascot and pocket square, lyle has a (presumably) denim shirt with no sleeves, ray has a fur coat minus a shirt, pat has a vest (?), vlad has some odd black cap, and beef has such as a simple t-shirt.

name: ssddr
text: That's Lie Bot, Vlad has not even appeared yet!

name: rowboat
text: Please don't forget Philippe's tie. Please don't do that.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Lyle's shirt wins, hands down.

And it's just so suited to drinking from bottles with handles.

name: greymantledwolf
text: "I want a huge amount to drink" sometimes i think i'm a cross between lyle and ray

name: zem
text: in reality you're more of a nolan/pat

name: greenkoolayd
text: [high5]wicked burn!

name: nicolae
text: Why is Blister perpetually posed such as one who has been crucified?

name: f1shst1ck
text: This arc is where the characters really start to shine. After this I knew I was hooked on Achewood.

name: brzbee
text: my first strip!

name: i_love_kate
text: So, did you just hit random strip, or did you choose this one from the archives because it looked good?

name: hypoluxa
text: Beef used to be a big time smoker.

name: tekende
text:
So did I.

I miss those days.

name: caddon
text: The arrival of Ray's nipples.

name: phthoggos
text:
Jesus, Pat.
What happened to you?

name: orvel
text: Philippe officially knows more jokes than I.

name: rbisme
text: Teodore brings the class

name: melloclello
text:
Taps knife on glass

It is midnight on the 10th/11th of August, and I would just like everybody to know that I have finished reading the Achewood archives. I began here, and I have looped around from the beginning. It has been a wild ride, and I am thankful to all. Good cheers.

name: heccibiggs
text: hahaha Jesus at first I thought you meant you were tapping like a hunting knife on someone's window, as though lightly threatening murder.

name: tekende
text: I think that says a lot more about you than it does about melloclello's comment.

name: notcool
text: Every time I read this arc, I get the song "Garden Party" stuck in my head. Please, please somebody ask me why someday.

name: sardoniclaconic
text: ...why?

name: wingspan
text: ...why?

name: pajano
text: "I learned five jokes!" made it

name: cpnglxynchos
text: why haven't we become friends here yet. what. the. crap. these are the thoughts that carry me through the darkest nights.

name: shatneresque
text: I like to think that Teodor kicked Mr. Bear and Lyle and Philippe out before inviting everyone in. They were all helping setting up and he is just like, ah! Fifteen 'til! Out out out.
